title: CURATED RAIN
description: CURATED RAIN - is an extensive sound library containing 129 unique files (387 total) of rain in varying environments and conditions.
longDescription: CURATED RAIN - is an extensive sound library containing 129 unique files (387 total) of rain in varying environments and conditions ranging from city streets, back alleys, parks, forests, windows and cars to barns, warehouses, tin roofs and greenhouses. Each file comes in three intensity level subfolders; “RAW” (lightly edited and the “heaviest” intensity), “CLEAN” (a medium level of editing and “medium” intensity) and “DRY” (heavily edited and “light” intensity). All of our libraries comply with the Universal Category System metadata naming convention standard. Files are presented in 44.1 kHz / 16 bit (VIDEO GAME).
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  129 Unique .wav files of rain in various environments with three intensity variations of each file.
  •  Universal Category System metadata file naming standard.
  •  Royalty-Free.

Number of Audio Waves: 387

Number of Audio Cues: 387

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 kHz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 19 Hours 11 Minutes 24 Seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZIkkpgGyXtSqnymHIkM7N9tdRZOVmT2n/view?usp=share_link
